Name: maximize_team_velocity

Description: Maximize the minimum observed team velocity to improve consistency

Description: Maximize the peak velocity achievable by the team

Description: Minimize total estimated effort of tasks selected for a sprint

Description: Minimize aggregate severity of active blockers

Description: Minimize number of cards on the Scrum Board to reduce WIP

Name: maximize_story_points
Description: Maximize total story points of completed user stories

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize priority coverage of features planned for release

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of sprint goals

Name: minimize_daily_scrum_duration
Description: Minimize duration of Daily Scrum while maintaining effectiveness

Name: minimize_sprint_planning_duration
Description: Minimize Sprint Planning duration in minutes

Name: maximize_review_attendance
Description: Maximize stakeholder attendance count in Sprint Reviews
